summary: Charles Michael "Chuck" Palahniuk  is an American satire author.
full_text:
Charles Michael "Chuck" Palahniuk  is an American novelist and freelance journalist, who describes his work as transgressional fiction.
He is the author of the award-winning novel Fight Club, which also was made into a feature film. He maintains homes in the states of Oregon and Washington.
title: Chuck Palahniuk
